title: ISic003642. I.Sicily inscription 003642
body:
Facsimile Images

1[---]ΡΙΝ·
2[....]ΤΕ
3[.......]ΕΝΠΤΕ
4[....]Σ
5[---]Μ
6[.....]Β´
7[.....]Ζ´

Apparatus criticus

Text after Manganaro, compared to photograph; Manganaro: ΡΙΝΕ; lapis: possibly ΡΙΝΟ/Ω
5: Manganaro: [ἀμέ]μ[πτως ?]; lapis: [----]M (vac.)

translation

commentary

Line 1 must contain the name of the deceased.

bibliography

  • Manganaro 1965 198 no.2 tav.70.2 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001841
  • Manganaro 2001 81 no.XII, fig. 12 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001806
